text: 3.18-19 Jon 1.16, Lom 10.3, 10.11-12, Epe 1.18, 1.23, Kol 2.2, 2.9-10 Klays ne binɨb okok kɨlop mapen lup ak, kɨlop mapen awl yɨbɨl lup. Ak tek ak nɨbi ayɨp God binɨb ne mɨdupsek ayɨp kɨles dɨl, ne kɨlop mapen lup anɨb ak gos nɨgtep gɨnɨmɨb agɨl God nop agnepin. Klays ne binɨb okok kɨlop mapen lup anɨb ak, adek awl alaŋ amɨl, yi okyaŋ amɨl, gol adaŋ amɨl gol adaŋ amɨl gup, nɨgɨnɨmɨb agɨl God nop agnepin.
